title: Athletics at the 2000 Commonwealth Youth Games
text: At the <a href="2000%20Commonwealth%20Youth%20Games">2000 Commonwealth Youth Games</a>, the <a href="Athletics%20%28sport%29">athletics</a> events were held at the <a href="Meadowbank%20Stadium">Meadowbank Stadium</a> in <a href="Edinburgh">Edinburgh</a>, Scotland from 11–13 August. A total of 30 events were contested, divided equally between the sexes. Among the medallists were <a href="Nicola%20Sanders">Nicola Sanders</a>, the <a href="2007%20World%20Championships%20in%20Athletics">2007 World Championships</a> runner-up in the <a href="400%20metres">400 metres</a>, and <a href="Johan%20Cronje">Johan Cronje</a> (bronze medallist at the <a href="2013%20World%20Championships%20in%20Athletics">2013 World Championships in Athletics</a> in the <a href="1500%20metres">1500 metres</a>).
